about_the_game: This game plunges players into a challenging geometric space where they must control an airplane flying forward. Using the A and D keys to steer the plane left and right, players navigate through a space filled with obstacles. They must skillfully maneuver the plane to avoid these obstacles to continue progressing. The farther you fly, the higher your score; if you manage to pick up halos during your flight, you earn an additional 500 points. As time goes on, the speed of flight gradually increases, putting greater demands on the player's reaction time and operational skills. Accompanied by thrilling music, the game heightens the sense of tension and excitement, immersing players in an intense aerial race.

The farther you fly, the higher your score; if you manage to pick up halos during your flight, you earn an additional 500 points. As time goes on, the speed of flight gradually increases, putting greater demands on the player's reaction time and operational skills. Accompanied by thrilling music, the game heightens the sense of tension and excitement, immersing players in an intense aerial race.
name: Semantics

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6600
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
